title: is there any Rioter immediately please?
body:
i got toxic premades ( in my last game please review it i wont play tell you do ) i will wait 2 days for only this.

Support kept *wasting farm* just because i told him you wasting your hp too much while i cannot farm not only he taking farm it but its wasted while telling others that vayne is getting over me and by the meaning that im bad etc. and Sona told me cause you started it. just because i said you are wasting your HP im started it like this?

Kai'sa jungler that kept telling me cause you sucks and can't deal with vayne.

Galio mid that told in all chat report troller.

Illaoi top that says im inting.

Can these players banned already? why should anyone play with them? and what if i get banned because of that? yea ofc i kept complaining a bit? yeah ofc i tried to defend myself before i knew they are premade? i didnt insult or anything but yeah i complained a bit about sona *wasting* the farm.

There is no one in this world want to play with ( blaming team mates one ) that when i said you are wasting your HP it is not blaming it is like take care about this. but blaming when they say your are sucks, you are bad, you cant deal with. etc but they are strangers people already? they don't know you? why do they judge with blaming or even harassing or insulting yea it happened.. also now i m sure 100% i got 4 reports.. and i complained a bit.

During to that i was trying to win i died a bit more than anyone else,, can someone review this case? by sona saying you are started it while i didn't even say more than *you have wasting your HP* ?? why im considered to be as toxic one when im not? why is the use of chat if you cant say anything?

if * you are wasting your HP * not considered as toxic can you ban sona at least?

replies.body: If you reported after the game, you did what you were supposed to. Premade or not is really irrelevant honestly. They 'may' get chat restricted or some punishment, but I doubt it unless they have a history.
